content: stay on-trend with this fetching crochet bucket hat stitched in our economical red heart super saver 50g pack you can make 6 hats from one pack worked in the round from the crown down the pattern features colorwork increases chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch and more the checkered design is a timeless favorite so make a few extras as unique gifts materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ brights kit includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 93 yds/85 m each 1116 yds/1020 m total size one size to fit adult - approx 20 51 cm circumference
